name: KlimaDAO
intro: On-chain scaling solution for the carbon market
introduce: KlimaDAO is an on-chain scaling solution for the Voluntary Carbon Market. By combining tokenized carbon credits with a blockchain-enabled tech stack, KlimaDAO aims to open up the market to greater transparency and efficiency. KlimaDAO is responsible for the removal of over 17,000,000 tonnes of carbon credits from the Voluntary Carbon Market since its launch in October 2021.
